channel.title: KQ change forms
channel.description:
Hey it's been a while since I've been coding, I got my new computer though, I'm the person who ran Legendz PK. I had KQ switching forms a while ago, and basically what happened was:
There were 2 waves, one for the first form, 1 for the second. In an If statement, I would tell the server that if npc id for kq is killed (1158, If I remember right), it'll initiate wave 2. I remember that these were done in npchandler.java and client.java, but If anybody can give me some help, It would be much appriciated.
Thanks, Legendz Mod Whip Owner of Legendz PK[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2009, 01:44:07 pm[/size][hr]Feel free to post suggestions!

item.title: KQ change forms
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Hey it’s been a while since I’ve been coding, I got my new computer though, I’m the person who ran Legendz PK. I had KQ switching forms a while ago, and basically what happened was:

There were 2 waves, one for the first form, 1 for the second. In an If statement, I would tell the server that if npc id for kq is killed (1158, If I remember right), it’ll initiate wave 2. I remember that these were done in npchandler.java and client.java, but If anybody can give me some help, It would be much appriciated.

Thanks,
Legendz
Mod Whip
